name: Hexologic
detailed_description:
The world of Hexologic is all about the hexes.

Immerse yourself in the relaxing atmosphere of the game world and take the challenge of more than 40 different levels adorned with colourful graphics.
It is the easiest way to compare Hexologic with Sudoku, except that it takes place in three possible directions!
The player's task is to fill the values inside the fields so that their sum matches the one given at the edge.
With Hexologic, you will easily discover the basic mechanisms of deduction, and over time, further challenges prepared for demanding players.

Hexologic is:

  • Approachable tutorial for beginners.
  • 4 different worlds
  • Over 40 different levels.
  • Perfect for enthusiasts of logic challenges.
  • Special time-challenge levels.

Do you like Sudoku? You will love Hexologic!

short_description: Do you like Sudoku? You will love Hexologic! A puzzle game based on hexagonal fields. Over 40 different levels where you will challenge your deductive abilities.
